title: Took a break from league for a while and came back to find my account was stolen
body:
Hey guys,
So I've been playing LoL since season one on the same account and have spent possibly hundreds of dollars. The better part of 3 years has been spent building this account and making it my own and building friendships along the way. I took a break from LoL about 5ish months ago to focus on school and figured I would come back for Christmas break. Well, To get to the point I tried to log into my account the other day only to find out I couldn't remember my password. NBD, I'll just change it. Well, I went to change it and realized I couldn't remember what email I used. I have only 4 emails that I use for everything so I was confused. I went and decided to just look myself up on LoLKing and saw that my account was still active and being played... And it most definitely wasnt me playing it. I quit last season while maining Poppy top and somehow I finished the season with Cass and all these champs I had never really played before. Then to this season(which I havent personally played a single game) there have been games being played. I emailed Riot to try and prove that account was mine. The account review process definitely doesn't favor somebody who doesn't keep track of everything they have done in LoL for the past 3 years. I have no idea who the first 5 champs I purchased or gifts that I've sent or received. I'm not sure what to do from here. Somebody is playing on my account and I don;'t have the information riot is asking for. I do however have screenshots and videos of the account that only the account owner could have. Ill post the links. I want my account back and I just need help to figure out what to do.
//screenshots from the client 
http://imgur.com/a/YoU2U
//Video of my buddy and I playing 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=k1VIzUp0ODQ 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ETw47kaSZ7k

replies.body:
We can't really address account recoveries here on the boards. You'll have to reach back out to a recovery specialist in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) in order to attempt recovery again. I know some of the info can sometimes be hard to recall, but just do your best at providing as much information as possible and do your best to work with your assigned specialists, as there's no other way to recover the account unless we can confirm you're the account owner. 

Let me know if you have any issues submitting your ticket.

Go to the top right where your summoner name is here on boards and hover your mouse over it to get a drop down menu, then click on settings.

here you will be taken to a page where you will see a partial email showing.

if that partial email is something you recognize, good, that means if you try to reset your password then that's the email that it will be sent to.
if you do not recognize or remember it, you may wish to consider submitting a ticket here:


    https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Make sure to pick “I have a question About League of Legends/Riot Games” and then “Games and Features -> General Questions”.
